unnormalised: Spilling the Chai: Are Ranbir & Alia on the Rocks?
normalised: Spilling the Chai: Are Ranbir and Alia on the Rocks?

unnormalised: Bollywood’s power couple, Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt, are facing some serious whispers in the filmi circles. Sources are saying things aren’t exactly "Kesariya" behind the scenes!
normalised: Bollywood’s power couple, Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt, are facing some serious whispers in the filmi circles. Sources are saying things aren’t exactly "Kesariya" behind the scenes!

unnormalised: Apparently, a major tiff happened during the promotions for Alia's upcoming Netflix debut. Insiders claim Ranbir felt Alia was overshadowing him, and a full-blown drama unfolded backstage!
normalised: Apparently, a major tiff happened during the promotions for Alia's upcoming Netflix debut. Insiders claim Ranbir felt Alia was overshadowing him, and a full-blown drama unfolded backstage!

unnormalised: Remember that blind item in Stardust Magazine? Many are now suspecting it was about these two!
normalised: Remember that blind item in Stardust Magazine? Many are now suspecting it was about these two!

unnormalised: Fueling the fire, Alia was recently spotted WITHOUT her wedding ring at an Ambani party, and Ranbir looked glum. Coincidence? We think not!
normalised: Fueling the fire, Alia was recently spotted without her wedding ring at an Ambani party, and Ranbir looked glum. Coincidence? We think not!

unnormalised: Even students at JNU are buzzing about it, saying they overheard crew members talking about it during a film shoot on campus.
normalised: Even students at J N U are buzzing about it, saying they overheard crew members talking about it during a film shoot on campus.

unnormalised: Is this just a temporary glitch, or is it the end of the road for "Ralia"? Stay tuned for more piping hot gossip! We're keeping our ears to the ground!
